task.title: How to use the Mac Desktop Computer
task.shortdesc: The Mac Desktops are top of the line computers that are up to date with the latest Apple technology.

taskbody.prereq: In order to login to the Mac Desktop you'll need your username and 6-digit password that were sent to you by AirClassroom when you booked the space. Look for an email entitled "AirClassroom Shanks 360 Guest".

step.cmd: Power on computer by holding down the "home" button for 5 seconds.
Enter your username and password, which were sent to you by AirClassroom.
Follow the steps for Two-Factor Authentication to access the WiFi (see Two-Factor Authentication tab for how to use this feature).

postreq.b: Be sure to save all of your information online via Google Drive or on a flash drive to ensure you do not lost any information. The computers are reset at the end of each day.
